column2: "Na EWURADZE n’ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Israel do bio
column3: na opiapiaa David ma ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ

column2: "Na ɔhen no see dɔm no do safohen Joab a ɔka no ho no dɛ
column3: Afei kɔ kekyin wɔ Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu
column6: ma munhu ɔman no hɔn dodow."

column2: "Na Joab see ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Afei EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nka ɔman no ho dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse biara mbɔho ɔha
column4: na mo wura ɔhen mfa n’enyiwa nhu: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mo wura ɔhen repɛ dɛm adze yi?"

column2: "Naaso ɔhen no n’asɛm yɛɛ dzen wɔ Joab do
column3: na dɔm no mu asafohemfo no do. Na Joab na dɔm no mu asafohemfo no fii ɔhen no enyim sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrekɛkan Israel ɔman no."

column2: "Na wokotwaa Jordan
column3: na wɔkɔbɔɔ asese wɔ Aroer
column4: kurow a ɔda Gad ɔbɔn no ne finimfin

column2: "na nkyii wɔbaa Gilead
column3: na Tatim-hodsi asaase do; na wɔbaa Dan-jaan
column8: na Keenanfo nkurow nyinara mu: na wopuei kɔr Juda epomu afamu

column2: "Dɛm ntsi aber a wokyiin asaase no nyinara do wie no
column3: nna wɔbaa Jerusalɛm abosoom akron na adaduonu n’ewiei."

column2: "Na Joab dze ɔman no hɔn anobu no dodow no brɛɛ ɔhen no: na Israel mu mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam a wɔtwe afona wɔyɛ mpem ahaawɔtwe; na Juda mbarimba no wɔyɛ mpem ahaenum."
"Na David kaan ɔman no n’ekyir no
column3: n’akoma bɔɔ no paa. Na David see EWURADZE dɛ
column4: Mayɛ bɔn kɛsenara wɔ dza mayɛ yi mu: na afei
column7: yi w’akowaa no bɔn kɔ; na mayɛ nkwaseadze dodow."

column2: "Na David soɛɛr anapa no
column3: EWURADZE n’asɛm baa nkɔnhyɛnyi Gad
column10: nsɛm ebiasa na medze risi w’enyim; fa no mu kor

column2: "Nna Gad baa David nkyɛn
column3: na ɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ no
column5: Ana mfe esuon kɔm mbra wo do wɔ w’asaase do a? Anaa iboguan wɔ w’atamfo enyim abosoom ebiasa mber a woritsiw wo? Anaa ɔyardɔm mbra w’asaase do ndaansa? Afei hwɛ na hu mbuae kor a memfa mensan menkɛma nyia ɔsomaa me no."

column2: "Na David see Gad dɛ
column3: Mo ho akyer me papaara: afei ma yɛnhwe EWURADZE nsamu; na n’ehumbɔbɔr dɔɔ so: na mma mma monnhwe nyimpa nsamu."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE maa ɔyardɔm baa Israel do fi anapa araa dze kodur mber a ɔhyɛe no: na ɔman a ofi Dan araa dze kodu n’aponto asefo no
column3: no mu nyimpa mpemeduosuon wuwui."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no tseen ne nsa wɔ Jerusalɛm do dɛ ɔresɛɛ no no
column3: EWURADZE sesaa n’adwen wɔ mbusu no ho
column4: na ɔsee ɔbɔfo no a ɔsɛɛ ɔman no dɛ
column5: Ayɛ yie; afei gyina wo nsa. Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no wɔ Jebusnyi Arauna n’ewuporowee no ho."

column2: "Na David hun ɔbɔfo no a okunkum nkorɔfo no
column3: ɔkaa kyerɛɛ EWURADZE dɛ
column6: na mara na metwa nkontompɔ: na nguan yi dze
column8: ma wo nsa mbra emi na m’egya fi do."

column2: "Na Gad baa David nkyɛn da no
column3: na ɔbɛsee no dɛ
column5: na kesi afɔrmbukyia ma EWURADZE wɔ Jebusnyi Arauna n’ewuporowee hɔ."

column2: "Na David fowee kɔree dɛ mbrɛ Gad n’asɛm no tse
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛe no."

column2: "Na Arauna hwɛe
column3: na ohun ɔhen no na no nkowaa no dɛ wɔreba ne nkyɛn: na Arauna fiir edzi
column4: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ ɔhen no enyim dze n’enyim boom famu."

column2: "Na Arauna see dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na mo wura ɔhen reba n’akowaa nkyɛn yi? Na David see dɛ
column4: Morobɔtɔ wo hɔ ewuporowee no mesi afɔrmbukyia
column6: ma woeesianka yardɔm no efi ɔman no do."

column2: "Na Arauna see David dɛ
column3: Wɔmma mo wura ɔhen mfa na ɔmbɔ afɔr dɛ mbrɛ oye wɔ n’enyi do: hwɛ
column4: anantwi a wɔdze bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column5: na ewuporowee ndzɛmba na anantwi ahyehyɛdze a wɔdze bɛyɛ nyina nye yi:"

column2: "iyi nyinara
column3: mo wura ɔhen
column4: Arauna dze ma ɔhen. Na Arauna see ɔhen no dɛ

column2: "Naaso ɔhen no see Arauna dɛ
column3: Oho; mbom ɔtɔ ara na mobɔtɔ no wo hɔ dɛ mbrɛ no bo tse ara: nkyii so morommbɔ ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn a ɔnnsom me hwee. Nna David tɔɔ ewuporowee no na anantwi no maa dwetɛ dwetɛbona eduonum."

column2: "Na David sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ maa EWURADZE
column3: na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr na asomdwee afɔr. Nna EWURADZE tsiei maa asaase no
column4: na wosiankaa ɔyardɔm no fii Israel do."
